column4: when i switch user and try to login with root ...the password said that is invalid why?
because ubuntu does not like it when you login as root
it prefers you to login as user, then sudo -s
it should handle it, but for advanced graphics cards, like new nvidias, you have to install the company's version
that card is very underpowered, it may not do even the simplest things
